Title: Establishes a New York city grant program for laundry equipment or facilities in certain schools
Summary: Establishes a grant program for New York city's public K-12 schools which are eligible for support provided under Title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, for the purposes of installing laundry equipment for facilities for use by students and parents or guardians of students.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a New York city grant program for laundry equipment or facilities in certain schools
